text: Frances McDormand (born June 23, 1957) is an American movie, television and stage actress. She won the Academy Award for "Best Actress" for her portrayal of Marge in 1996's Fargo. She was nominated three times for "Best Supporting Actress". McDormand was born in Chicago, Illinois. She is married to Joel Coen since 1984 and has two adopted sons. They currently live in New York City. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Chicago Category:American Academy Award winning actors Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners
title: Frances McDormand
